question.title: What will Finland score on the 2026 World Happiness Report?
question.description:
Every year, on the [International Day of Happiness](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/International_Day_of_Happiness), Oxford University, using data from the Gallup World Poll, publishes the [World Happiness Report](https://www.worldhappiness.report/about/), which ranks nearly every country in the world on a single measure, the self-reported life satisfaction, or happiness, of their residents.

Specifically, respondents [are asked](https://www.worldhappiness.report/faq/):

> Please imagine a ladder with steps numbered from 0 at the bottom to 10 at the top. The top of the ladder represents the best possible life for you and the bottom of the ladder represents the worst possible life for you. On which step of the ladder would you say you personally feel you stand at this time?

The Nordic countries have historically done very well on the World Happiness Report, with Finland in particular taking [the top ranking each year since 2017](https://data.worldhappiness.report/table). In that time period, [Finland's average scores](https://data.worldhappiness.report/country/FIN) have ranged from a low of 7.660 (for 2016) to a high of 7.889 (for 2020). For 2024, Finland's average score was 7.781.

`{"format":"metac_reveal_and_close_in_period","info":{"post_id":41954,"question_id":41693}}`
question.resolution_criteria: This question will resolve as Finland's average annual happiness score for 2025 according to the [World Happiness Report website](https://data.worldhappiness.report/country/FIN).
question.fine_print:
Note that the World Happiness Report publishes both annual scores and three-year averages. This question will resolve according to the "annual" figure for 2025.

If data for 2025 has not been published before May 1, 2026, this question will be annulled.

***
This question's information (resolution criteria, fine print, background info, etc) is synced with an [original identical question](https://www.metaculus.com/questions/41954) which opened on 2026-02-18 17:00:00. This question will resolve based on the resolution criteria and fine print contained above. However, if this question would resolve differently than the original question, then this question will be annulled. Additionally, if the original question's resolution could have been known before this question opened, then this question will be annulled.
question.short_title: What will Finland score on the 2026 World Happiness Report?
